name: SmartClapsPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open smart claps podcast”
”Alexa, ask smart claps podcast for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start smart claps podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart claps podcast
des: Listen to the latest talks from your favorite smart claps podcast. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
